articles.headline: Bitcoin rebounds after drawdown reaches 20%. Is the crypto winter over or just starting?
articles.description: Bitcoin could lose about 80% of its value if it follows its previous bear-market patterns, analysts said. But they're uncertain a crypto winter has started.

articles.headline: Stock Market Today: Nasdaq, Dow Gain; Bitcoin Price Rebounds — Live Updates
Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq slide as bitcoin tumbles to kick off December
articles.description: Wall Street's strong late-November rebound looked set to hit a speed bump on the first trading day of December.

articles.headline: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq step higher as bitcoin surges in broad bounce back
articles.description: Wall Street is eyeing a comeback as the flight from risk starts to cool.

articles.headline: Bitcoin sell-off halts Trump family's crypto windfall
articles.description: Due to a recent downturn in bitcoin, the Trump family has had roughly a billion dollars of their net worth erased in just a matter of weeks, according to estimates.

articles.headline: American Bitcoin stock plunges, Amazon's ultra-fast deliveries
articles.description: Yahoo Finance's John Hyland tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including President Trump stating he will announce the next Federal Reserve chair in early 2026, American Bitcoin (ABTC) stock plunging by nearly 40%, and Instacart (CART) — which operates as Maplebear, Inc. — stock drops on Amazon's (AMZN) offering of ultra-fast deliveries. Catch Yahoo Finance's full interview with American Bitcoin co-founder and chief strategy officer Eric Trump from our 2025 Invest conference in November. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

articles.headline: Trump Family-Linked American Bitcoin Sinks on Crypto Downturn
articles.description: The sharp pullback in Bitcoin prices over the past month is making an impact on speculative corners of the cryptocurrency market.

articles.headline: Bitcoin champion Strategy launches ‘dollar reserve’ amid crypto sell-off
articles.description: Shares tumble as group warns of loss of up to $5.5bn if digital asset prices do not rebound

articles.headline: Strategy CEO on bitcoin buying strategy amid crypto volatility
articles.description: As bitcoin (BTC-USD) climbs back above $90,000 on Tuesday, Strategy (MSTR) CEO Phong Le sits down with Julie Hyman to talk about the crypto treasury firm's bitcoin buying strategy as the cryptocurrency continues to experience volatility. Watch the full interview with Phong Le by clicking here. Also catch Yahoo Finance's full interview with Strategy co-founder and executive chairman Michael Saylor from our 2025 Invest conference. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

articles.headline: Michael Saylor's Bitcoin Hype Machine Is Glitching Out
articles.description: Here’s how Michael Saylor’s Bitcoin treasury company Strategy Inc. is supposed to work: The firm raises funds to buy Bitcoin; that buying drives up the price of Bitcoin; the share price of Strategy follows suit. Rinse and repeat. The trade, helped along by the utter self-belief of Saylor as a hype capitalist on par with OpenAI Inc.’s Sam Altman, has been so lucrative it has spawned dozens of imitators hoping to capture the same “infinite money glitch,” like a cheat code on a video game.
